channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: M. Asam Beauty Is Our Tradition
channel.desc: Enjoy younger looking skin with M.Asam, an effective skincare range that blends innovative technique and ingredients including grape oil, to target fine lines and wrinkles.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Aveda Gifts
channel.desc: Upgrade your loved ones' haircare ritual with Aveda, showcasing gorgeous gifts to give their locks that little lift. From blow-out presents to stocking stuffers, find something they'll adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves...
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gift Collections
channel.desc: Looking for present inspiration this festive season? Tune in for a wide spectrum of beauty gift ideas and find friends, family, teachers the perfect present this Christmas.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Supersize Beauty Gifts
channel.desc: Supersize Beauty Gifts.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Botanical Christmas Gift
channel.desc: If you're a fan of Liz Earle's natural skincare, then you won't want to miss this show, highlighting the products packed with botanicals.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gifts with L'Occitane
channel.desc: Tune in for a little help finding the perfect gift for your loved ones from L'Occitane's incredible range of bath, body and skincare treats, all crafted using beautiful ingredients from Provence.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: The Feel Good Edit
channel.desc: Tune in for the The Feel Good Edit at QVC. Explore top fitness, health and personal care products that inspire beauty and happiness inside out.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gifts with Dyson
channel.desc: Birthday, anniversary or just because? Whatever the occasion, join us for ideas and inspiration for truly pampering presents in our Beauty Gifts showcase. In this show it's all about Dyson.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gift Event
channel.desc: Give the gift of gorgeous with our must-have beauty edit. With innovative tools, cult products and make-up of the moment, you're sure to find the perfect present for the beauty lover in your life.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty's Best Finds
channel.desc: Up your beauty game with our best finds in the industry, from favourite formulas to the latest releases. Whether you want to shake up your make-up or step up your skincare, find it here.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis The Gift Of Great Skin
channel.desc: We bring you the beauty of Elemis - famed for their premier spa and salon treatments. Tune in and discover incredible value skincare, perfect for gifting or treating yourself to.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Aveda Gifts
channel.desc: Upgrade your loved ones' haircare ritual with Aveda, showcasing gorgeous gifts to give their locks that little lift. From blow-out presents to stocking stuffers, find something they'll adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: M. Asam Beauty Is Our Tradition
channel.desc: Enjoy younger looking skin with M.Asam, an effective skincare range that blends innovative technique and ingredients including grape oil, to target fine lines and wrinkles.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gift Event
channel.desc: Give the gift of gorgeous with our must-have beauty edit. With innovative tools, cult products and make-up of the moment, you're sure to find the perfect present for the beauty lover in your life.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: The Gift of Beauty
channel.desc: Find the right beauty gift for friends and family from skincare must-haves and make-up essentials to on-trend nail colours and beauty gadgets.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis The Gift Of Great Skin
channel.desc: We bring you the beauty of Elemis - famed for their premier spa and salon treatments. Tune in and discover incredible value skincare, perfect for gifting or treating yourself to.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Hair Gain
channel.desc: Care for your hair from the inside and out with the help of Hair Gain. From supplements to hair masks and combs, this is your complete haircare collection and every product has a story behind it.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Gatineau Beauty Gifts
channel.desc: Gatineau fan? Us too! Join us as we talk all things beauty with this specialist brand, with a whole host of luxurious, must-have formulas any skincare sage would love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gift Event
channel.desc: Give the gift of gorgeous with our must-have beauty edit. With innovative tools, cult products and make-up of the moment, you're sure to find the perfect present for the beauty lover in your life.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gifting
channel.desc: Featuring a wide spectrum of beauty gifts, from skincare to cosmetics, this show aims to inspire you in your choice of festive gifts for the special people in your life.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Laura Geller Make-Up Gifts
channel.desc: Love beauty? Get inspired with gift ideas from Laura Geller, a spectacular line of cosmetics developed due to Laura's belief that all women can look their best with the right products and know how.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Offer Ends Today
channel.desc: Don't miss out on our fantastic selection of top beauty deals - all ending today.
